entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
